summary: Muscles, cop from Hong Kong, is in Japan chasing a bad HK cop. His cop partner gets taken by the ninja gang. Muscles gets his 5 old no-good friends from the orphanage to help find the bad cop. Lots of comedy and kung-fu fighting follows.
cast: Sammo Kam-Bo Hung|Charlie Chin|Stanley Sui-Fan Fung|Richard Ng|Eric Tsang|Sibelle Hu|Jackie Chan|Biao Yuen|Tat-Wah Tso|Paul Chang Chung|Ching-Ying Lam|Chia-Yung Liu|Dick Wei|Michiko Nishiwaki|James Tien|Ping Ha|Ho-Kai Law|Bolo Yeung|Chic Lau|Wing-Hon Cheung|Chau Sang Lau|Chi-Ming Yu|Wing-Cho Yip|Billy Lau|Ha Huang|Kwai Shan|San Tai|John Cheung|Wah Cheung|Kar Lok Chin|Kam Kong Chow|Chi Kit Lee|Yun-Chiang Peng|Mo Yuen|Wah Yuen|Ka-Leung Wong|Ying Lung|Kim-Ban Wong|Wellson Chin|Kong Chow|Guo Chan|Kin-Nam Cho|Yau Cheung Yeung|Wu Ma
title: La banda de los supercamorristas
